table.label: qcranges
table.title: Quality Control Ranges
table.description: Data ranges for use in quality control

rowAttribute.label: url
rowAttribute.title: Link to review page
rowAttribute.description: Link to a web page providing background information.

rowAttribute.label: valid_min
rowAttribute.title: Minimum expected value for this variable.
rowAttribute.description: The minimum expected value will be used, if set, in quality control tests, and files containing data values below this value will be marked as containing errors.

rowAttribute.label: valid_max
rowAttribute.title: Maximum expected value for this variable.
rowAttribute.description: The maximum expected value will be used, if set, in quality control tests, and files containing data values above this value will be marked as containing errors.

rowAttribute.label: ok_min_mean_abs
rowAttribute.title: Minimum expected value of the mean absolute value at each point in time
rowAttribute.description: This value, if set, will be used in quality control tests, and files containing data values above this value will be marked as containing errors.

rowAttribute.label: ok_max_mean_abs
rowAttribute.title: Maximum expected value of the mean absolute value at each point in time
rowAttribute.description: This value, if set, will be used in quality control tests, and files containing data values above this value will be marked as containing errors.

rowAttribute.label: valid_min_status
rowAttribute.title: Status of valid_min
rowAttribute.description: Indicates the degree of confidence in the valid_min value provided.

table.label: places
table.title: Places, States or Reservoirs
table.description: An abstract entity defining an extensive quantity of something, e.g. liquid water, suspended carbon.

rowAttribute.label: pid
rowAttribute.title: Parent Entity
rowAttribute.description: A place, state or reservoir containing this one.

table.label: transfers
table.title: Transfers of Material
table.description: Quantities expressing the transfer of material from one 'place' to another.

rowAttribute.label: frid
rowAttribute.description: Identifier of the 'place' that the flux is from.

rowAttribute.label: toid
rowAttribute.description: Identifier of the 'place' that the flux is to.

rowAttribute.label: isOneWay
rowAttribute.description: Set true if the flux is associated with a physical process which only transfers mass in one direction. E.g.

rowAttribute.label: signInverted
rowAttribute.description: Sign Inverted should be set True for one way fluxes if the variable is defined to be negative definite. The competing constraints of CF Standard Name protocols and domain usage can cuase problems with the sign convention.

rowAttribute.label: vid
rowAttribute.description: Identifier of the 'CMORvar' associated with the flux.
